title: Heavy Duty Combined Cleaning (sifter) Integrated Flour mill Machine EPC provider: www.immy.cn

tasks.task: Amplify acoustic input.
Manage tracking system auto operations.
Operate a combine harvester.
subtasks: Step into the cab to enter.
Check tractor tire pressure and hood tension.
Ensure gloves are worn for comfort and safety.

tasks.task: Check combine harvester operation.
subtasks: Inspect the front with a headlight.
Confirm that all parts are properly connected.
Look under the machine for any issues.
Press the "work start" button to begin operating.
Monitor the operator panel for status.

tasks.task: Adjust combine harvester settings.
subtasks: Adjust the cut height and threshing settings.

tasks.task: Monitor combine harvester performance.
subtasks: Keep an eye on the ethanol tank's dehydration.
Ensure the auger is operating smoothly.

tasks.task: Control combine harvester movement.
Assist combine operator with stalk cutting.
subtasks: Nod in agreement when settings are correct.
Check if the stalk cut is appropriately high.

tasks.task: Monitor combine harvester vacuum system.
subtasks: Visual inspection for clogs or blockages.

tasks.task: Adjust offset wheels.
subtasks: Shift the wheels to the left or right.
Set the distance between wheels for cutting.
Monitor the adjustment pin for correct engagement.

tasks.task: Check and adjust combine harvester track tension.
subtasks: Listen for noise or uneven movement.

tasks.task: Manual intervention to start the machine.
subtasks: If needed, press the manual start button.

tasks.task: Stop combine operation and check for issues.
subtasks: Immediately check for any visible problems.
Continue or pause the harvest operation.

tasks.task: Make an emptying decision for the harvest bin.
subtasks: Wait until the bin is full.

tasks.task: Drive the combine harvester to the grain storage.
subtasks: Maneuver the machine safely to the target location.

tasks.task: Hail a tractor driver or operator for assistance.
subtasks: Look for a colleague in the vicinity.
Call out or use a walkie-talkie for help.

tasks.task: Communicate the stalk cutting height to a colleague.
subtasks: Discuss with someone nearby through communication devices.
Agree on the desired cut height and adjust accordingly.

tasks.task: Ensure grain auger covers are properly closed.
subtasks: Check both sides of the combine.
Manually close any open covers if necessary.

tasks.task: Secure the combine's grain tank during transport.
Use the stalk height setting buttons.
subtasks: Press the "plus" button for taller stalks.
Use the "minus" button to decrease height.

tasks.task: Conduct regular safety checks during harvest.
subtasks: Check the machine for any signs of wear or damage.

tasks.task: Monitor grain flow through the system.
subtasks: Look for any blockages or leaks.

tasks.task: Manage the combine's stalk retaining mechanism.
subtasks: Adjust the mechanism based on crop type.

tasks.task: Oversee the transport of harvested grain.
Engage the combine's stalk threshing mechanism.
subtasks: Ensure the threshing sections are set correctly.

tasks.task: Balance the combine's tracks during turning.
subtasks: Make turns clearly and avoid tipping.

tasks.task: Consult a map to plan the combine's path.
subtasks: Have a field map visible in the cab.
Follow the designated routes for efficiency.

tasks.task: Apply emergency stops if needed.
subtasks: Isolate the machine from the field.
Restore operations only after safety checks.
